answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources you might find helpful.
This is a guide from the Department of Administration in Minnesota for Choosing a Consultant for Local Planning. It contains sample interview questions.
http://www.lpa.state.mn.us/pdf/Choosingconsultant.pdf
I also included a sample RFP for the Comprehensive Plan of Countryside, Illinois.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3290/Request_for_Proposals_Comprehensive_Plan
This is a Guide to Selecting a Private Partner from the California Debt and Investment Advisory Commission.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302101
Two other cities are also interviewing consultants. You may want to contact these jurisdictions individually for more information on their procedures.
City of Flint, MI
http://www.mlive.com/news/flint/index.ssf/2011/10/city_of_flint_interviewing_con.html
Washington City, MO
http://www.emissourian.com/news/washington_news/article_4c46ef4a-c18b-5737-b0d6-3c2fda562bf8.html 
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Jeffrey Snyder
text: The City will be interviewing planning consultants for our Comprehensive Plan...I am looking for some sample interview questions to ask the consultants?  I appreciate your responses.
title: Interview Questions for Planning Consultants
